subject: Order: SSN4537
description_text:
Hi team,

This order did not arrive yet, I need help to know what happened and I have
other problem with other order which one the vibrator was not working, 2 of
them, this one SSN3372, do you have any update of the tracking because you
told me I will have a replace of them.

Best Regards,

Sergio Seara

conversations.body_text: Hi Sergio Moreira Seara,   Could you please take a screenshot of the Feedback Setting page in SIMSONN Manager? I’d like to check the configuration of your vibration motor.

[image: image.png]

On Mon, 8 Dec 2025 at 09:22, support@simsonn.com

I tested the motors, and aparecntly if I move the cable, to other place on
the controller only the one I have in the break y working now

On Mon, 8 Dec 2025 at 09:54, Sergio Moreira Seara <sergiomose96@gmail.com>
wrote:

> [image: image.png]
>
> On Mon, 8 Dec 2025 at 09:22, support@simsonn.com

Another thing I notice is when I have the motor in VAM on software, the
strength is stronger than when I have it in the VAM Pro (the one I need to
have for correct working, now about the tests I did it was on VAM), and
sometimes when I do the test the motor finish the vibration at half of the
bar of the progress of the test in the software in the only motor is working

On Mon, 8 Dec 2025 at 09:55, Sergio Moreira Seara <sergiomose96@gmail.com>
wrote:

> I tested the motors, and aparecntly if I move the cable, to other place on
> the controller only the one I have in the break y working now

This is the configuration I use normally

wrote:

> strength is stronger than when I have it in the VAM Pro (the one I need to

Hi Sergio Moreira Seara,     I need to clarify something: for VAM motors, you must use VAM mode, not VAM Pro mode. The software provides this option because using VAM Pro mode can quickly damage the VAM motor.  Could you tell me how you have been using it? Also, which motors are currently working and which are not?

I maintained the default settings they are VAM 30% strength and for the
clutch 0-100% ratio range and the one is working now is the one on the
break, the middle one is in the controller on motor 2
Hi Sergio Moreira Seara,  So, two VAM units were damaged, correct? The VAM motor is not suitable for prolonged continuous vibration feedback, whereas VAM Pro does not have this issue.

[image: image.png]
This is the configuration I have, the thing is the Motor3 and Motor1 are
not working. And this happens after 2 hours of playing in all the time I
used them

On Mon, 8 Dec 2025 at 11:24, support@simsonn.com

Hi Sergio Moreira Seara,  Please provide your contact name, address, and phone number, and we will send you two replacement VAM motors. Also, make sure to use VAM mode, not VAM Pro mode, and avoid using continuous telemetry signals such as RPM or speed.

Sergio Seara

Rua Actriz Palmira Bastos 13 1D
Lisboa, Lisboa 1950-003
Portugal

+351932620152‬

To Confirm I show to you the screenshot with the configuration:
[image: image.png]

On Tue, 9 Dec 2025 at 06:36, support@simsonn.com
ID 为 7670 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7670  
      主题: I have a problem with the vibration  
      描述:  after few days of usage the vibration stop working in game, the break is still having a little bit of vibration but the others have not vibration can you help me?   
 Order: #SSN3372 
 Tracking number: CE326631529DE

Hi Sergio Moreira Seara,    I apologize for not responding to you sooner. I see your order has been delivered.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047152632485   Also, here is your replacement link.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2536500706798566     Happy New Year!
